clusters.title: Rugby league ditches rock ‘n’ roll for soul with grand final entertainment
clusters.neutral_headline: Teddy Swims to Headline NRL Grand Final Entertainment
bullet_summary: The NRL has announced Teddy Swims will headline the 2025 grand final entertainment

items.title: Rugby league ditches rock ‘n’ roll for soul with grand final entertainment
items.standfirst: American soul and country singer Teddy Swims will perform at the 2025 NRL and NRLW grand finals.
items.content: American soul and country singer Teddy Swims will perform at the 2025 NRL and NRLW grand finals.

items.title: US 'superstar' to headline NRL, NRLW grand final entertainment
items.standfirst: T eddy Swims' game day gig will also kick off his tour of Australia and New Zealand.
items.content: Grammy-nominated chart topper Teddy Swims will headline this year's entertainment for the NRL and NRLW Grand Final Day, it has been announced.US singer Swims, well-known and acclaimed for his I've Tried Everything But Therapy albums and hit single Lose Control, was announced as the main act for the entertainment roster at Accor Stadium on Sunday, October 5.The performance will also kick off his tour of Australia and New Zealand.READ MORE: Aussies like Casper are working younger as the cost-of-living crisis rages on NRL chief executive Andrew Abdo said Swims was one of the most exciting musicians in the world."Grand Final day is a special event on the sporting calendar, capturing moments that last forever," he said."Including a fresh superstar like Teddy Swims alongside some of the best male and female athletes in the world will take the entertainment experience for sports fans to a whole new level."READ MORE: Warnings issued as more rain, potential floods threaten NSW Swims said he was "so excited" to be scheduled to play."Australia has always been a second home to me," he said."Every time I am there I am overwhelmed by how welcoming the people are, I fall more in love with the culture, and just everything about it."So, to be welcomed to perform one of the biggest nights in Australia is a huge honour."DOWNLOAD THE 9NEWS APP: Stay across all the latest in breaking news, sport, politics and the weather via our news app and get notifications sent straight to your smartphone. Available on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

items.title: Teddy Swims to headline NRL grand final
items.standfirst: The NRL has announced Teddy Swims will headline the 2025 grand final entertainment.
items.content: The NRL has announced Teddy Swims will headline the 2025 grand final entertainment.

ai_summary: Teddy Swims will headline the 2025 NRL grand final.
He is an American soul and country singer.

His performance will kick off his tour of Australia.
The tour will also include New Zealand.

clusters.title: Swedish health minister collapses during media conference
clusters.neutral_headline: Swedish Health Minister Collapses During Conference

items.title: Swedish health minister collapses during media conference
items.standfirst: O ther officials, including the nation's prime minister, rushed to help her as she hit her head.
items.content: A media conference in Sweden was abruptly brought to a halt after the country's newly appointed Health Minister collapsed.Elisabet Lann was standing next to the country's Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson and other officials when she suddenly fell over and hit her head on Tuesday.Video footage shows Kristersson and other people on the stage in Stockholm rushing to help her as she tumbled over.READ MORE: Newly uncovered page in Epstein's 'birthday book' implicates TrumpLann was given first aid while an ambulance was called, local media reports.She returned a short time later with no apparent injuries, saying her collapse was sparked by a blood sugar drop. A government statement said her life was out of danger and her health was stable.Lann had been appointed health minister on Monday after the sudden resignation of her predecessor. DOWNLOAD THE 9NEWS APP: Stay across all the latest in breaking news, sport, politics and the weather via our news app and get notifications sent straight to your smartphone. Available on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

items.title: Psychiatrists fear medicinal cannabis adverse events are 'tip of the iceberg'
items.standfirst: Despite more than 600 reports of "adverse events" for medicinal cannabis in the past three years, the Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) is yet to investigate the safety of most medicinal cannabis products. It has now launched a review.
items.content: Despite more than 600 reports of "adverse events" for medicinal cannabis in the past three years, the Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) is yet to investigate the safety of most medicinal cannabis products. It has now launched a review.

ai_summary: Over 600 adverse events have been reported for cannabis.
The TGA has not investigated most medicinal products.
The TGA has launched a review of the products.
Psychiatrists fear the events are just the beginning.
The safety of medicinal cannabis is under scrutiny.

clusters.title: Russian strike on Ukrainian pension distribution centre kills 24
clusters.neutral_headline: Russian strike on Ukraine kills people at distribution center

items.title: Russian strike on Ukrainian pension distribution centre kills 24
items.standfirst: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says a guided bomb struck the village about 24 kilometres from the city of Sloviansk.
items.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says a guided bomb struck the village about 24 kilometres from the city of Sloviansk.

ai_summary: A Russian strike hit a Ukrainian pension distribution center.
The strike occurred near the city of Sloviansk.
Ukrainian President Zelenskyy reported the strike.
A guided bomb was used in the attack.
Twenty-four people were killed in the strike.

clusters.title: How Trump's alleged Epstein note compares to his previous drawings and letters
clusters.neutral_headline: Trump's alleged Epstein note compared to other works

items.title: How Trump's alleged Epstein note compares to his previous drawings and letters
items.standfirst: Donald Trump's alleged 2003 letter to Jeffrey Epstein shares similarities to other drawings and correspondence he has produced.
items.content: Donald Trump's alleged 2003 letter to Jeffrey Epstein shares similarities to other drawings and correspondence he has produced.

ai_summary: Donald Trump's alleged note to Jeffrey Epstein is analyzed.
The note was written in 2003.
The note is compared to other Trump writings.
Similarities are found in his drawings and letters.
The comparison provides context to the note.
